subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Though both teams are no longer in the running for the Big East championship, Pitt failed to salvage a .500 season while Rutgers evened its conference record.
snippet: Though both teams are no longer in the running for the Big East championship, Pitt failed to salvage a .500 season while Rutgers evened its conference record.
